title: Work
description: Trying to become a better analyst at Zapier.

title: Outside
description: Shaving multiple yaks as I circle around starting to write for fun again. Hence the all-new AH.com, Simple Analytical getting shut down and a new home for Analysts Assemble.

title: Play
description: Sorted the tires on my bike out for the first time in years so I can slowly lap around the estate with the kids.

title: TV
description: Watching ER all the way through from the start - we’re currently ready to start Season 5.

title: Music
description: The sounds of Laurel Canyon after watching the excellent recent documentary.

title: Reading
description: I have been terrible when it comes to reading anything other than the daily doomscroll of Twitter. Still have more of Stephen King’s “If It Bleeds” to work my way through.

title: Football
description: Blessed relief as the English Premier League season is over and I can relax without THFC-related blood pressure issues until the middle of September.
